member.name: T:Unity.Deformations.BlendShapeWeight
member.summary: Float buffer that contains weight values that determine how much a corresponding blend shape is applied to the mesh.
member.remarks: This data structure is used for mesh deformations.

member.name: F:Unity.Deformations.BlendShapeWeight.Value
member.summary: The weight value of the blend shape.

member.name: T:Unity.Deformations.SkinMatrix
member.summary: Matrix buffer that contains the skinned transformations of bones in relation to the bind pose.
member.remarks: This data structure is used for mesh deformations.

member.name: F:Unity.Deformations.SkinMatrix.Value
member.summary: The matrix buffer of the skinned transformations.
